title: Simple Password Hasher
description: Simulate password hashing by creating a reversible encoding function. Demonstrate why plain text passwords are dangerous.
instructions: Create a hashPassword(password) function that converts each character to its shifted ASCII value (char + 3). Create verifyPassword(input, hash) that checks if the hashed input matches. Print the hash and verification results.

hints.text: To verify, hash the input and compare with stored hash
Use String's map function to transform characters

commonMistakes.correction: Always compare hashes, never store plaintext
Ensure the hash function is deterministic
The simple shift works for ASCII characters
